verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* he \w entered|strong="G1525"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Capernaum|strong="G2584"\w* \w after|strong="G1223"\w* \add some\add* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it was \w noised|strong="G0191"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w was|strong="G2076"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w straightway|strong="G2112"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w* were gathered \w together|strong="G4863"\w*, insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* there was no \w room|strong="G3371"\w* to \w receive|strong="G5562"\w* \add them\add*, no, not so much \w as|strong="G3366"\w* \w about|strong="G4314"\w* the \w door|strong="G2374"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w preached|strong="G2980"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w bringing|strong="G5342"\w* one sick of the \w palsy|strong="G3885"\w*, which was \w borne|strong="G0142"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when they \w could|strong="G1410"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* come nigh \w unto|strong="G4331"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* the \w press|strong="G3793"\w*, they \w uncovered|strong="G0648"\w* the \w roof|strong="G4721"\w* \w where|strong="G3699"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* when they had \w broken|strong="G1846"\w* \add it\add* \w up|strong="G1846"\w*, they let \w down|strong="G5465"\w* the \w bed|strong="G2895"\w* \w wherein|strong="G3739"\w* the sick of the \w palsy|strong="G3885"\w* \w lay|strong="G2621"\w*.

\w When|strong="G1492"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto the sick of the \w palsy|strong="G3885"\w*, \wj  \+w Son|strong="G5043"\+w*, \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w sins|strong="G0266"\+w* \+w be forgiven|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w*.\wj*

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* of the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w* \w there|strong="G1563"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w reasoning|strong="G1260"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*,

\w Why|strong="G5101"\w* \w doth|strong="G2980"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \add man\add* \w thus|strong="G3779"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w blasphemies|strong="G0988"\w*? \w who|strong="G5101"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* \w forgive|strong="G0863"\w* \w sins|strong="G0266"\w* \w but|strong="G3361"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w only|strong="G1520"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* \w when|strong="G1921"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w perceived|strong="G1921"\w* \w in|strong="G4151"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w they|strong="G1260"\w* \w so|strong="G3779"\w* \w reasoned|strong="G1260"\w* \w within|strong="G1722"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w reason ye|strong="G1260"\+w* \+w these things|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w your|strong="G5216"\+w* \+w hearts|strong="G2588"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w Whether|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w is it|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w easier|strong="G2123"\+w* \+w to say|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w to the sick of the palsy|strong="G3885"\+w*, \+add Thy\+add* \+w sins|strong="G0266"\+w* \+w be forgiven|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w*; \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w to say|strong="G2036"\+w*, \+w Arise|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w take up|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w bed|strong="G2895"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w walk|strong="G4043"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w that|strong="G2443"\+w* \+w ye may know|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w hath|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w power|strong="G1849"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w earth|strong="G1093"\+w* \+w to forgive|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w sins|strong="G0266"\+w*,\wj* (he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* to the sick of the \w palsy|strong="G3885"\w*,)

\wj  \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w Arise|strong="G1453"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w take up|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w bed|strong="G2895"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w go thy way|strong="G5217"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w thine|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3624"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* he \w arose|strong="G1453"\w*, took \w up|strong="G0142"\w* the \w bed|strong="G2895"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* went \w forth|strong="G1831"\w* \w before|strong="G1726"\w* them \w all|strong="G3956"\w*; insomuch \w that|strong="G5620"\w* they were \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w amazed|strong="G1839"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w We|strong="G1492"\w* \w never|strong="G3763"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* it on this \w fashion|strong="G3779"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he went \w forth|strong="G1831"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* the sea \w side|strong="G2281"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* \w resorted|strong="G2064"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* he \w taught|strong="G1321"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* as he passed \w by|strong="G3855"\w*, he \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w Levi|strong="G3018"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \add son\add* of \w Alph√¶us|strong="G0256"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w* \w at|strong="G1909"\w* the receipt of \w custom|strong="G5058"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Follow|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*.\wj* \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0190"\w* arose \w and|strong="G0450"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, that, \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w* sat at \w meat|strong="G2621"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w house|strong="G3614"\w*, \w many|strong="G4183"\w* \w publicans|strong="G5057"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w* \w sat|strong="G4873"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w together|strong="G4873"\w* with \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w many|strong="G4183"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* when the \w scribes|strong="G1122"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w eat|strong="G2068"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w publicans|strong="G5057"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*, they \w said|strong="G3004"\w* \w unto|strong="G3101"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w*, How is \w it|strong="G5101"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w eateth|strong="G2068"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w drinketh|strong="G4095"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w publicans|strong="G5057"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*?

\w When|strong="G0191"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w They that are whole|strong="G2480"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w no|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w need|strong="G5532"\+w* \+w of the physician|strong="G2395"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w they that are|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w sick|strong="G2560"\+w*: \+w I came|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w to call|strong="G2564"\+w* \+w the righteous|strong="G1342"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w sinners|strong="G0268"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w repentance|strong="G3341"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* of \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w used|strong="G2258"\w* to \w fast|strong="G3522"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Why|strong="G5101"\w* do the \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* of \w John|strong="G2491"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w fast|strong="G3522"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w thy|strong="G4674"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w fast|strong="G3522"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Can|strong="G1410"\+w* \+w the children|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of the bridechamber|strong="G3567"\+w* \+w fast|strong="G3522"\+w*, \+w while|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w the bridegroom|strong="G3566"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*? \+w as long as|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w they have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w the bridegroom|strong="G3566"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w them|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w they can|strong="G1410"\+w*\+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w fast|strong="G3522"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w But|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w the days|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w will come|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3752"\+w* \+w the bridegroom|strong="G3566"\+w* \+w shall be taken away|strong="G0522"\+w* \+w from|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w then|strong="G5119"\+w* \+w shall they fast|strong="G3522"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w those|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w days|strong="G2250"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w No man|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w seweth|strong="G1976"\+w* \+w a piece|strong="G1915"\+w* \+w of new|strong="G0046"\+w* \+w cloth|strong="G4470"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w an|strong="G2440"\+w* \+w old|strong="G3820"\+w* \+w garment|strong="G2440"\+w*: \+w else|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w the new piece|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w that filled|strong="G4138"\+w* \+w it|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w up|strong="G4138"\+w* \+w taketh away from|strong="G0142"\+w* \+w the old|strong="G3820"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the rent|strong="G4978"\+w* \+w is made|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w worse|strong="G5501"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w no man|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w putteth|strong="G0906"\+w* \+w new|strong="G3501"\+w* \+w wine|strong="G3631"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w old|strong="G3820"\+w* \+w bottles|strong="G0779"\+w*: \+w else|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w the|strong="G3631"\+w* \+w new|strong="G3501"\+w* \+w wine|strong="G3631"\+w* \+w doth burst|strong="G4486"\+w* \+w the bottles|strong="G0779"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the wine|strong="G3631"\+w* \+w is spilled|strong="G1632"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the bottles|strong="G0779"\+w* \+w will be marred|strong="G0622"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w new|strong="G3501"\+w* \+w wine|strong="G3631"\+w* \+w must be put|strong="G0992"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w new|strong="G2537"\+w* \+w bottles|strong="G0779"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, \w that|strong="G3899"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w went|strong="G3899"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the corn \w fields|strong="G4702"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w*, as they \w went|strong="G3598"\w*, to \w pluck|strong="G5089"\w* the ears of \w corn|strong="G4719"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Pharisees|strong="G5330"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G1492"\w*, \w why|strong="G5101"\w* do \w they|strong="G4160"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* the sabbath \w day|strong="G4521"\w* that \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1832"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w lawful|strong="G1832"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Have ye|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w never|strong="G3763"\+w* \+w read|strong="G0314"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w David|strong="G1138"\+w* \+w did|strong="G4160"\+w*, \+w when|strong="G3753"\+w* \+w he had|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w need|strong="G5532"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w was an hungred|strong="G3983"\+w*, \+w he|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they that were|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w How|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w he went|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w in the days of|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w Abiathar|strong="G0008"\+w* \+w the high priest|strong="G0749"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w did eat|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w the shewbread|strong="G4286"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w is|strong="G1832"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w lawful|strong="G1832"\+w* \+w to eat|strong="G5315"\+w* \+w but|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w for the priests|strong="G2409"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w gave|strong="G1325"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w to them which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w were|strong="G5607"\+w* \+w with|strong="G4862"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w said|strong="G3004"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w The sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w* \+w was made|strong="G1096"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w*, \+w and not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w the sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w Therefore|strong="G5620"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w Lord|strong="G2962"\+w* \+w also|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w of the sabbath|strong="G4521"\+w*.\wj*
